summary: This adds fully functional enchantments that fortify the power of magic, similar to the alchemy effects. It also adds enchantments for waterwalking, fortify athletics, night eye, and a few elemental visual effects for armor.
descriptionHtml:
This was a test plugin I made using Skyedit to add missing enchantments to the available enchantment list. I also dabbled with adding a permanent FX shader to armor, which was difficult to get to work without causing the game to crash.

There are two varieties of the plugin. One is non-intrusive (It doesn\'t add any references to the world or edit any existing assets), so you need to add the objects with the enchantments to your inventory with the console (using player.additem). The second adds a single new container at Shearpoint so the items can be picked up without using the console.

The following new items are added with the plugin:

Ebony Helmet of Destructive Power (A more powerful Destruction Power)
Ebony Helmet of Minor Destruction Power
Ebony Helmet of Minor Alteration Power
Ebony Helmet of Minor Conjuring Power
Ebony Helmet of Minor Illusion Power
Ebony Helmet of Minor Restoration Power
Ebony Boots of Waterwalking
Black Hood of Storms
Black Hood of the Silent Storm
Black Hood of Flames
Black Hood of the Silent Flame
Black Hood of the Squall
Black Hood of the Silent Squall
Black Hood of Darkness
Circlet of Night Eye
Sonic Boots
The readme lists the BaseIDs.

Enjoy being the most capable enchanter in all of Skyrim!
author: Dyurakushiru
